comment.author: 51972867@N06
comment._content: Amazing! An image of the legendary VAB being constructed, a few years later the first Saturn v gets rolled out from this building...

comment.author: 88400688@N02
comment._content: That is really awesome! I wish that I could go and check out a construction site like that. I would like to see all of the tools that they use to build something like this. I bet that there are mini piles or tools everywhere. Thanks for the great picture!
